room_title: Escape room "Operation Ares: Escape from Mars" by Kryptic Tales in Irvine
room_description:
You and your crew are part of the Ares 1 team, the first of several manned missions to Mars.

Suddenly, a solar flare disables communication, disrupts the station's power, and destroys life support!

With only an hour of oxygen left you and your crew must repower the station, establish communication with the orbital station, and send down a rescue probe in order to escape!
